issue.title: [Python] Cython warning in types.pxi
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17697](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17697). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I currently get this warning when compiling PyArrow:
```Java

warning: pyarrow/types.pxi:508:4: Overriding cdef method with def method.
warning: pyarrow/types.pxi:625:4: Overriding cdef method with def method.
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17697?focusedCommentId=17603461) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Perhaps we can turn Cython warnings into errors if that's possible?

`[~milesgranger]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17697?focusedCommentId=17612343) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14280
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14280>
